LOL!

nal Message -----

sday, April 02, 2009 4:07 PM

 welcome to the group.

el.

  I am not your normal ghost hunter. I am skeptical, but I keep an ope=
n mind to any possibility. Until everything has been proven once and for al=
l, anything is possible.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Frank=
 Sumption 
    To: group 
    Sent: Thursday, April 02, 2009 4:02 PM
    Su=
bject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Hi All


    Thanks. I can be a bit critical of ghost =
hunters, but htat's cuz I think ghosts travel and I do all my recordings at=
 home.
     
     F-S
